article: Lots of children like  to watch  TV. From TV, they can learn a lot .They also can learn a lot from the radio and books ,but they like learning from TV. Why ?Because they can listen and watch  _  the same time .But they can't see  _  on the radio and they hear nothing  _  the books. Many children only watch TV  _  Saturday or Sunday evenings. They are very busy  _  their lessons from Monday  _  Friday. But some children watch TV every  _  and they go to bed very  _  .They can't listen to the teacher  _  in class next morning.
